item.title: VERDE RESOURCES INC 10-K
item.description: VERDE RESOURCES INC, which is in the Gold & Silver Ores [1040] industry, SEC 10-K filing on November 04, 2022 had 23487 (cleaned) words - 600 were utilized for the visualizations.
